overview: When daddy catches the girls messing around he's upset, only because they didn't invite him to join in!  Dava Foxx and Camille Black - I saw this sexy MILF sobbing while I visited my mom's gravesite. I offered a shoulder to cry on, so we went to stepdaddy's house.  Gina West - The other night while we were fucking, I asked my husband to bring another man into the bed and to my surprise he called out stepson in. Russel was a bit confused at first but knowing I had permission I led him to my mouth,  Hope Harper and Gabriella - OMG, Mommy convinced me we needed to bond with stepdaddy together.
title: Daddy's Favorite Threesomes
